content: ***updated pattern & new video *** ad-free pdf now available for $1 99 original coaster uses 4mm hook resulting in a 4 diameter new video uses 5mm hook and measures approx 6 quick and easy & makes a great gift set pattern details ▶ beginner level with video tutorials ▶ one size adjust with hook size ▶ uses lion brand s comfy cotton blend http //shrsl com/1i3rp ▶ size us h/5 mm crochet hook https //amzn to/2wpi5oe ▶ tapestry needle ▶ written in u s terms ▶ you may sell the finished items but please credit designer and reference back to www designsbyphanessa com
